page.title: 20FARMING
page.content: FARMING The main activity in this area is farming and it obviously forms the major form of employment.There were few farmworkers' homes in the area and to-day many of those living in cottages seemed to be commuters, working in Bristol, Bath,or Chippenham. The farm workers presumably live in villages nearby, such as Pucklechurch which provide more readily accessible services for those on lower incomes. Farming seemed prosperous, buildings modernised and enlarged, outbuildings large and spacious. Farm machinery was evident, both in use as hay balers, or housed under cover from the wet June weather.The willingness of farmers to give up their time to talk about their lives seems evidence that they are happy with their lot.
